thread.section_title: Crowne Plaza Times Square Manhattan - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Tops in all areas
thread.title_full: Tops in all areas - Review of Crowne Plaza Times Square Manhattan, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: FLNYC
title: Tops in all areas
text: Our long weekend getaway was fantastic. Checking in with Victoria was a breeze. Our room was ready early and we got to check in around 11:30. Free drink and breakfast vouchers were given to us. The king room was one of the biggest we have in NYC. And the location can't be beat. This will be our hotel of choice from now on.
